overview: Travel to the Mediterranean with Three, a Lust Cinema Original adult series by Erika Lust starring performers Gia Green, Bunnie Bennett, and Sylvan.  Three explores the love and heartbreak of ethical non-monogamy and start of a triple love story. It is more than just an adult threesome movie; itâ€™s an exploration of human sexuality and desire as three people fall in love and show us that loving two people at the same time can be more than just an arousing fantasy. This adult series is for all of the people yearning for more sexual freedom and new ways of being in love.
title: Three, Volume 1
